physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination was unremarkable; body mass index was 22 kg/mÂ².

physical_examinations.date: Two years after the index evaluation
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: ECG revealed new development of negative T waves in leads II, III, aVF, V5, and V6; resting echocardiography showed hypokinesia in the inferolateral regions with moderate (grade 2) mitral regurgitation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: New negative T waves developed two years later; resting echocardiography showed changes in hypokinesia in the inferolateral regions.
